title: Update hero logo img src and className in App hero section

requirements.summary: Update only the Hero section logo in frontend/src/App.tsx to use the exact required src and className without changing any other attributes or any other code.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/App.tsx, the hero logo (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1]) has src exactly "/assets/Gadget Zone-Logo-1.png".
That same has className exactly "h-24 md:h-32 mx-auto mb-6".
No other attributes on that are changed (including alt).
No other code/markup/styling anywhere else in the project is modified as part of this change.

file_operations.description: Locate ONLY the Hero section logo element (the one inside the Hero section content wrapper, matching XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1]) and change ONLY its src to "/assets/Gadget Zone-Logo-1.png" and ONLY its className to "h-24 md:h-32 mx-auto mb-6". Do not change alt or any other props/attributes on that , and do not modify any other elements or files.
